website_summaries.verdict: A well-crafted comforter for the ultimate sleeping experience. The best available.
cons: Too large for most commercial washers

customer_reviews.title: The description was totally accurate!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited over this comforter!!! I have looked for years to find one wide enough for my king size bed with deep mattress set.
customer_reviews.author: wanda willis

customer_reviews.title: Box Stitching...not baffle box.
customer_reviews.text: We have this on our bed now. It's a box stitch which means that there are x amount of feathers in each box....and in three years there will be the same amount of feathers in the box. It's not baffle box stitch which "Helps" feathers stay in place...but in two years they have all shifted to your husbands side and now you basically sleep under two fitted sheets. I bought this comforter about a year ago...and I still love it. Nice, fluffy warm. And....the feathers haven't shifted.
customer_reviews.author: Xu Hawj

customer_reviews.title: Positive ratings are true
customer_reviews.text: 3 months in and I haven't seen a single feather or been poked by one. Fits my queen size bed perfectly. I'm a hot sleeper and haven't had any issues with overheating from the blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Best in class for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This puppy keeps me very warm! The lady friend has Reynolds and he circulation is poor because of this. Even when the house is at 65 she's nice and toasty with this comforter. It is not the super high level that a comforter from a 4 or 5 star hotel is however. Just keep that in mind if you are looking for a really big and puffy blanket that feels like a $1000 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Impecable
customer_reviews.text: Product is of very high quality and fits nicely in the oversize duvet cover. Timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter no shedding and is warm and puffy
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a month. So far no shedding, it's nice and warm, holds its fluff, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Picture on Amazon misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Picture on Amazon nothing like the actual product, be aware that you are ordering a very thin comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Russell

customer_reviews.title: Best choice!
customer_reviews.text: After much research sorting false claims and reviews, I repeatedly came up with this one, and ordered it. 20 minutes in the dryer fluffed it up with maybe a teaspoon of down dust. Can not find ANY feathers in ~ 8" pockets keeping down in place. Duvet added, probably not needed. 40 oz. is PERFECT - light in weight providing great warmth. 300 TC is realistic compared to claims of 1200 TC. Easily worth others at twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: I paired it with a quality Supima cotton duvet cover and it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. I tried another highly reviewed comforter, but the quality had declined and it was flat and the down was unevenly dispersed. So I sent it back and ordered the Royal Hotel. It's fluffy and lightweight, it keeps you warm but also breaths so you don't get hot. This is especially important because I live in Florida. I paired it with a quality Supima cotton duvet cover and it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This oversized comforter is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I looked long and hard to find a comforter that was boxed, striped, wide enough to cover the sheets on the sides that sit underneath and is comfortable to sleep under. It's wonderful and I've very, very happy with this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Ascani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice that it was light or would have ordered a warmer one but so far it's working
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my new comforter
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new comforter. The down is evenly distributed and the weight is perfect for me. It stays out throughout the night which allows restful sleep for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thayer McDougle

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Light weight and very comfy. I had a down comforter I neeeded to replace and went with a down alternative comforter. After one week I realized a true down comforter is the best way to go. Returned and purshased this one. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I've paid so much more for good down comforters before, and these are a great value for the price. I agree with those who said you might be surprised by how lightweight and even "see through" they can be if you're not used to buying down comforters. They are not as full of feathers as a down sleeping bag, but my down bag goes down to five below zero F and is way too hot for sleeping in my home. If your setback thermometer drops your house temperature to 55F you might want two of these, though.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Buyer. Comments Make All the Difference
customer_reviews.text: Purchased comforter on 2.23.17 and was delivered 2.25.17; very clean, professionally packaged. **NOTE** BUYERS NEW TO DOWN COMFORTERS, YOU MUST FLUFF YOUR COMFORTER FOR 15-20 MINS AFTER REMOVING FROM PACKAGE. THE "FLUFFY" LOOK, WE ALL SEEK, IS ONLY OBTAINABLE BY SEPARATING THE GOOSE DOWN FEATHERS THAT HAVE COMPACTED TOGETHER PER THE TIGHT PACKAGING AND OBVIOISLY, THE CHEMISTRY OF A FEATHER! I am highly recommending this comforter to any one seeking a reasonably priced, quality, perfect year-round down comforter. I will be purchasing another. Thank you, Royal Hotel Bedding!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Crocker

customer_reviews.title: I was used to a big heavy down comforter and was sad when this arrived
customer_reviews.text: This was a thinner than I had expected. I was used to a big heavy down comforter and was sad when this arrived. After getting used to it, it is surprisingly very warm and just as cozy as my previous one. I have learned to love it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding comforter- it's all I use covering me- LOVE it. Warm and comfy in cold Minnestoa
customer_reviews.author: bopper979

customer_reviews.title: Once it was in my duvet it looked perfect. It doesn't make a crinkly noise when moved ...
customer_reviews.text: This comforter looked really thin when it arrived but after several hours fluffed up a bit. Once it was in my duvet it looked perfect. It doesn't make a crinkly noise when moved around. I do find it to be pretty warm for summer though, even with my air conditioning. All the other seasons I think it is the perfect warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a lot
customer_reviews.text: The stuff inside comes out a lot. Like a lot. And it gets everywhere in my room and all over my clothes. The actual comforter is really plush and comfortable. You definitely need to get a cover for it to keep the pill from getting out. But then changing the cover to wash it is a whole other nightmare. Lots of sneezes followed by vaccuming. It's literally everywhere in every crevice, the tops of every table in my bedroom, my headboard , it sneaks it's way into my closet. Will never buy again. Currently on the hunt for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: alena summ

customer_reviews.title: Like others have stated
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated, the image is a tad misleading. This isn't a fluffy down blanket at all, but it's not as thin as other reviewers have stated. It does get a little warm in the summer but I decided to rid of my flat sheet and that helped with the heat. Should be good in the fall/winter.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Ensor

customer_reviews.title: The comforter is ok. It's flatter than I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is ok. It's flatter than I expected and I keep having little feathers come out every once in a while...I don't know if that's normal or what. I wish I could exchange it for another one at least, if the feathers are not supposed to come out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Vosburgh

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. This comforter is lightweight but it get very hot underneath it. My husband and I are super impressed. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. Brookey

customer_reviews.title: Warm and light
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the comforter we had forever (it had become a bit clumpy and thin in some areas). This comforter's down is evenly dispersed. It keeps us nice and warm on these cold winter nights (my wife especially loves it) and is fairly light (so you don't feel like its smothering you). An added bonus: the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Drooling increased!
customer_reviews.text: Feel like a king with this soft dream-like comforter. It does as advertised- I feel super comforted and rocking 100% POWER. My dreams have gotten better, aye more coloful and my drooling has went up at least 50% since this guy landed on our bed. The only problem is that our new baby's poop and barf easily stain this white, pristeen dream blanket. Thats not the comforter's problem though, so four stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Makaio

customer_reviews.title: This thing is Great! I didnt have high expectations
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Great! I didnt have high expectations, but was happy when i laid down under it. It is so light feeling and not bulky or heavy feeling at all. As a matter of fact I got it and questioned the quality because of how thin and mediocre it seemed. This thing keeps me warmer than my last comforter and does not smother me with the weight of the last one I had. I am extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholaus Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Our family was on vacation. The hotel we stayed had these great down comforters. We fell in love with them. I was very lucky to find this one. We love it! The price is just right compared to other high quality comforters. I purchased mine in July 2015,but just started to use it. It's perfect. Not too hot not too cold. I just ordered two more for my daughters. When it arrives it's flat and has a funny smell, but just leave it out for a couple of days and will start to fluff up and the smell will go away. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great comforter, not too heavy but definitely good for ...
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers, it appears flat when it arrives. Throw it in the dryer for 20 minutes and it will fluff up. It is a great comforter, not too heavy but definitely good for cold nights. I bought a full/queen size to use on my full bed and it is perfect. I did a lot of research and shopping around before I bought this comforter so I knew it was good quality before i bough it, and i am not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable compared to the cheap brands I'm used to sleeping ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable compared to the cheap brands I'm used to sleeping with. Was definitely skeptical when my wife bought this but it's worked out very well. Very soft and breaths well while sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Numan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Soft fabric. Not wide enough for my duvet or bed. Measure your bed carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Lili P.goodreading

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks would say it's 'just right'!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and cozy without being heavy and bulky. Works perfectly underneath a thin, decorative comforter without adding bulkiness.
customer_reviews.author: cbs

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Purpose.
customer_reviews.text: People are complaining that it is thin - but this is year round warmth, not super poof for -1000 degree weather in Antarctica. I live in southern Alabama, and this keeps me warm year round. I love it!! There are no cold spots, all down (no pokey feathers) but definitely buy a duvet cover. All duvets need one to preserve its longevity. I would absolutely buy this again! It fits my queen bed great, too. I read a few negative reviews about some of the stuffing coming out, so I immediately transferred it from the shipping package into the duvet cover and have had no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: I'd have to sleep on it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter in law, but she was thrilled with it after using for a few nights. She said that it was just what she wanted and the fit and appearance was great!
customer_reviews.author: ronnie I

customer_reviews.title: Love the comforter and would have given it five stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the comforter and would have given it five stars except feathers are always flying around. I think I will have to get a cover for it. But I love the feel and it keeps you nice and toasty warm!
customer_reviews.author: Rangegal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good and warm for a more southern climate.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo B

customer_reviews.title: Score
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this. King size really is king size. It does get a little warm and a few feathers escape occasionally. I am very happy I purchased this. The color is truly white - not an off white or some other version. Seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: happywife

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my wife, to replace an old, worn out down comforter we have been using for 15 years or more. It was a little larger than I thought it would be (good thing), and my wife finds it warmer then the old one. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bosephus

customer_reviews.title: awesome price and i've been happy for the past couple ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome price and i've been happy for the past couple of months owning this item. the only issue i have is that the fabric is a bit stiff, but i may still be in a break-in period. i haven't noticed any loose feathers, as noted by other reviewers. overall, fantastic for the price.
customer_reviews.author: seattle_sprocket

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket! It's not too heavy and I love how it keeps me warm in the winter! Just make sure to put it in the dryer for a quick fluff before use.
customer_reviews.author: PPG

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Size is great, but the material is not as soft as I had imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bullock

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Lightweight Comforter
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight but don't let that fool you because it is quite warm. I find most down comforters are too warm even for the winter so I was looking for one that was a little lighter but of good quality and I am happy to report that this works very well.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Decent but thin
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated, the image is misleading. This isn't a fluffy down blanket at all, its very thin. Works well for my needs though, gets a little warm in the summer. Should be good in the winter. Just beware that it is thin.
customer_reviews.author: TheComputerScientist

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter
customer_reviews.text: Love it you can't ask for a better comforter very soft and fluffy thank you we love it.
customer_reviews.author: felix wooden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my duvet cover and is nice and cozy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Haak

customer_reviews.title: best comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Comforter, Its so soft and warm that I hate get out from under it.. I would definitely recommend to all that can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Strickland, M

customer_reviews.title: I hate being hot when I sleep and this comforter is ...
customer_reviews.text: verrrrry fluffy!!! it perked right up after a few days and boy is it warm!!! I hate being hot when I sleep and this comforter is perfect for full body coverage with the feet stickin' out!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Nice comforter. It didn't fluff up as much as I thought it would but it works. Quality appears to be decent. It's for a guest room and shows well. If it were for my bed I would recommend ordering a comfort with more fill.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but check that it's the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but check the size of your comforter. Mine is smaller than this duvet cover by about 12" in width and so it slides around in the duvet cover a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Castaldi

customer_reviews.title: Superior size and warmth
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this quilt. The extra size ends the blanket war at night. The quilt is light feeling but very warm and we have windy, cold winter nights.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hart

customer_reviews.title: IT'S GREAT, LIGHT BUT WARM AND COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: IT'S GREAT, LIGHT BUT WARM AND COMFORTABLE. I HAVE SEVERE NERVE DAMAGE AND CAN'T SLEEP UNDER ELECTRIC BLANKET OR HEAVY COMFORTERS, I AM VERY HAPPY WITH MY DOWN COMFORTER. THANK YOU AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Ann B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this comforter
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this down comforter. The other reviews are right, it does not puff up like other down comforters, but the down also stays in place. It's the best one I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jan J

customer_reviews.title: down ,queen size  comforter.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase. I have not had it long enough to know about how this will look after washing and so on. It looked as described, was a good price and meets expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Maupin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great comforter - we don't get super cold nights and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comforter - we don't get super cold nights and when we do we turn the heater on. The weight on this is perfect for a room kept at ~69 or so. It fits great on our regular king bed with a duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: This one is price right and the quality seems great.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. It was hard to find a real down comforter with a 100% cotton shell for under $350. This one is price right and the quality seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Find!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how nice the comforter is. It's huge and was sooooo warm. I would buy this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Towanda

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but seems good in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Monique de Quay-Jones

customer_reviews.title: The best bedding we've ever purchased and at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: The best bedding we've ever purchased and at an amazing price. Almost want to buy a second just in case they stop selling them!
customer_reviews.author: Stebs

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware! This comforter shed so much, cost ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware! This comforter shed so much, cost me many nights of caughing and sneezing! First month I thought it's normal, I just dusted off in my yard. That seems worked at first, but feather leaked again! Comforter seems to be filled with shredded feathers that just leaks out of what claimed to be high threadcount sheets. I regretted buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nan Ke

customer_reviews.title: For what I paid it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Im no expert on rating these but for an originally priced at $300 comforter I was expecting it to be a little heavier in weight. For what I paid it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: SETH

customer_reviews.title: Royal Hotel Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a warm comforter that feels like sateen and I found it. Lightweight, warm and as cozy as a baby's blanket.
customer_reviews.author: CT Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Non-stop shredding for two years now
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this two years ago. Even today, the feathers are still coming out. We have to vacuum the room pretty much every single day. The comforter itself is comfortable but the non-stop shredding is way too annoying. We'll probably not recommend it to anyone. I wish I have contacted Royal Hotel Bedding for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick Yu

customer_reviews.title: ... to how the feathers were treated but that is easily fixed with a little alcohol and you favorite essential ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband I bought this for our 2nd anniversary(the cotton anniversary) It had a bit of an odd smell to it probably due to how the feathers were treated but that is easily fixed with a little alcohol and you favorite essential oil in a spray bottle(alcohol evaporates killing bacteria and odors and leaves behind a light fresh sent) the comforter itself is perfect weight for all seasons and is high quality soft Egyptian cotton, it doesn't need a duvet if you don't want one...I can't handle white so I got a duvet cover... but like I said it doesn't really need one unless you are aesthetically opposed to white.
customer_reviews.author: DangerKitten

customer_reviews.title: Quality problems
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the worst product I ever purchased from Amazon. After using it for a few months, the feather start leaking out from everywhere. Then I wrap it with another shell, and a couple of months later, lots of feather came out again. Every morning after waking up, I saw substantial amount of feature laying around, even on my floor. This product was made in such a bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tianlin Wang

customer_reviews.title: A little better.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely to touch. Not much loft/filling. Ran it on dryer w balls. A little better.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lee Kufeldt

customer_reviews.title: Good down
customer_reviews.text: Soft, & feels good. Duvet cover is necessary. My bed is low & dogs like to rub against or put thr paws up.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis C. Boliver

customer_reviews.title: No ties to attach to duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a "fluffy" as I was expecting. It did fluff up a little bit after being out of the package for awhile but not what I expected. There are no toes to attach it to the duvet cover. This is a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaykats Momma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect weight, not too heavy .. not too light and still in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: mary   Gerbers

customer_reviews.title: Light but feels great. High quality
customer_reviews.text: Light but feels great. High quality. I'm really surprised how well this is made for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: feather's leaking EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst comforter I've ever owned. I vacuum EVERY day - little feathers EVERYWHERE!! I went for cheaper than I normally would on a down comforter and obviously you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: susan kleva

customer_reviews.title: Down Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Warm and comfortable. I purchased the king size for a queen size mattress and the fit is perfect. I would definitely purchase this item again. It arrived on time and well packaged. The only down side, no variety of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: L. Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Nice and
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter. It took several days for it to "fluff up" she loves it. Nice and cozy
customer_reviews.author: mamaseeta4

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is great. I ordered it to be an over sized comforter for a full size mattress. It drapes perfectly to the ground! When I initially received it I thought it was too flat and I was not happy with the product. After a week it fluffed up a bit and now I really like it. It feels heavy and cozy but does not overheat me. I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying - do not buy unless you want to be ...
customer_reviews.text: even with the duvet cover, this conforter CONSTANTLY leaks feathers - they are everywhere! Very annoying - do not buy unless you want to be cleaning up little feathers up everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I listened to reviews on this product
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I listened to reviews on this product. At first, I was disappointed because it's very flat out of the box but I knew reviewers mentioned giving it a chance to fluff up and boy, am I glad I listened. About 4 days on the bed and I was in love. It fluffs up, it's super even distribution of feathers and it was by far the best value I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Cord P

customer_reviews.title: Its warm enough but it is like having a pet that sheds feathers everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This comforter creates a mess. All of the feathers will create a layer of feather dust around your room. Its warm enough but it is like having a pet that sheds feathers everywhere. I would like to return it but i've had it for almost a year. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: ade

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVED IT! Thanks to the reviews on helping me ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a very picky person....SHE LOVED IT! Thanks to the reviews on helping me choose it.
customer_reviews.author: dolly

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend;  good sales price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this while on sale and for record cold winter our almanac is predicting....In summer it is so soft and fluffy and does make me feel so comfortable:) Seems to be well constructed, and I believe it will be perfect for winter as well based on the research I've done.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: this is worst purchase and first to do this
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Feathers flying everywhere. Find somethg quality. I've had several white conforters and usually replace when the white becomes dim, this is worst purchase and first to do this. Very disappointed . Wouldn't recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not as full as picture. I compared ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not as full as picture. I compared the specs to the LL Bean down comforter before I bought it. Seemed comparable....it isn't. I wish I paid the extra and got the LL Bean. ( I have one and it is great)
customer_reviews.author: Cari Lapointe

customer_reviews.title: Superb Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is exactly as described. Received it yesterday and slept under it last night with just a sheet and the comforter. This is mid August (temps in high 80's) and I live in middle TN and was quite comfortable. Keep my nighttime A/C on 71. If you live where temps very cold, this might be too light for you. You can always add additional covers. The appearance is just like the pic except mine is not that fluffy yet. I do not really care whether it gets real fluffy. I wanted a medium weight white down comforter, and this is exactly that. I could not be more pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Boyce

customer_reviews.title: I like the weight
customer_reviews.text: The down stays in place, which has been a problem for me with other comforters that I have owned. The size generously covers my queen-size mattress and fills the duvet cover. I like the weight; it is perfect for San Francisco Bay Area climate.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie V

customer_reviews.title: It is more like a down blanket than a comforter
customer_reviews.text: It is more like a down blanket than a comforter...Just not very thick or fluffy...We are returning it for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: peter thorp

customer_reviews.title: This is an OUTSTANDING value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the same quality yo find in the top 5 Star international hotels at about 50% of the price.
customer_reviews.author: AZ KH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a good comforter, it could be fuller but overall I like it
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Just as described, Not to heavy, not too light. Perfect. I live in the south so we don;t have much of a winter here.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bacot

customer_reviews.title: Flat
customer_reviews.text: Very flat , I sent. It back after a few days . I had one on my bed that was a queen so I had to up it to a king . The one Iwas from Costco. So I went there and got one. Happy now
customer_reviews.author: mtmagic

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The stuff inside comes out a lot. Not good for health.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Photo is deceiving...
customer_reviews.text: Just an "ok" comforter... It is definitely not large enough for a king sized bed. It is not large enough to fill the king duvet cover that I bought. The photo is what sells this comforter...full, plump, and oversized. The one that I received was no where near what the photo conveyed even after a 20 minute toss in my dryer (suggested). It will have to go on a queen bed I guess...
customer_reviews.author: R. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice warm down comforter. I was pleasantly surprised at its quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: sequimtj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Like others have said
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Like others have said, it's not super puffy at first, but give it a couple weeks and it fluffs up. It's very warm and very comfortable. I ordered it while I was in the US to bring back to Canada, and I'm very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: wildcard

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect. It's very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I use this comforter all year round. It's perfect. It's very comfy. I'm even able to use it on the warmer nights. Fits in my duvet covers nicely. Only complaint I have is the amount of feathers that come out of it. I'm constantly vacuuming up feathers
customer_reviews.author: claire singleton

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice summer weight down topper throw
customer_reviews.text: It barely tops the bed. The photo is misleading. It's a nice summer weight down topper throw.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: 🥰❤️ It
customer_reviews.text: Love ❤️ it fluffy, warm, and comfortable have to give it at least 3days for fluff but definitely recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: Kameelah robinson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. For the price it is a a great deal
customer_reviews.author: N. Cioffi

customer_reviews.title: Love my comforter
customer_reviews.text: I love the down in separate squares so I never have to worry about it bunch into one side. It is warm and comfortable. This was a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B E Davis

customer_reviews.title: There must be better products on the market
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two - only received one and not reply to my enquiry. There must be better products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Philips

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this comforter
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this comforter. We made it through a very long and cold winter. It is very cozy, light and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: It's cosy and comfortable but very thin and light
customer_reviews.text: It's cosy and comfortable but very thin and light. If you're looking for a heavier down comforter look elsewhere. This is a perfect comforter for those warmer places.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Starke

customer_reviews.title: Received this item about a week ago. The down ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this item about a week ago. The down has fluffed up without having to do anything and even though the comforter is lightweight, it keeps me warm (my house stays at around 62-65 degrees).
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Walter

customer_reviews.title: Can a comforter be delicious? This one is!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is simply delicious! The weight is substantial but not too heavy: it's breathable and retains heat in the most satisfying balance. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this duvet. Also bought sheets, duvet cover, and a pillow from this company. Everything was great quality and such amazing prices! Couldn't be happier :)
customer_reviews.author: pishybug

product_meta.title: Royal Hotel's Queen Size Light Down-Comforter 650-Fill-Power 100 % Cotton Shell 300TC - Stripe White
product_meta.description: Size:Full/QueenThe ultimate in luxury! Our amazing light 650 + fill power 36 oz fill weight Light down-comforter floats within a 300 Thread count 100% cotton . The result is a comforter so luxurious and soft, you will believe you are truly covering with a cloud, night after night. This comforter also features stitched Box Design to avoid any shifting in your comforter and for the maximum warmth through out the comforter.
feature_bullets: Luxury down comforter provides medium warmth for year-round comfort
Full/Queen size 90x90 inches, 36 oz Filling with 600+ Fill power, 100% Down
300TC Cotton Cover. Hypo-allergenic, Allergy Free. Dry clean only
Box-stitching design to avoid any shifting in your comforter and for the Maximum warmth
Original in Package from "Royal Hotel" Manufacturer !
